item.title: 【Singles (lossless)】FLAC - Nine Inch Nails – As Alive As You Need Me To Be 7″ ["v1 rip," 24bit / 96kHz]
item.description:
Rip of the new NIN single from the “Tron: Ares” soundtrack, released yesterday. The b-side, “Empathetic Response,” is also from the soundtrack, but is not currently released elsewhere (This differs from the San Diego Comic-Con exclusive version, which featured “Building Better Worlds” as the b-side, also currently unavailable elsewhere).

I marked this rip as “v1″ because I’m in-between upgrading my setup (new cart and pre-amp on this one) and the sleeve of the single is trashed. I intend to return the 7” and am waiting on a new interface, so I fully anticipate doing this again.

I thought the rip was a little dark, so I’ve included EQ’ed versions of the tracks to brighten them up and match the digital release of the a side, but included the originals as well, for those (like myself) who prefer having the option of a more raw, unembellished option. Full details for both are outlined below and in the zip with the included text file.

Media condition: Near Mint (rip of 2nd play)

Hardware:
• Technics SL-Q350 automatic direct drive turntable
• Sonic Research Sonus PME. 5/LC cartridge with Empire 246-DEX stylus
• ARTcessories DJPREII phono preamplifier with “Low Cut” on, powered by 12 volt battery
• Hosa CPR-202 audio stereo interconnect (dual RCA out from preamp, dual 1/4” TS into interface)
• Focusrite Scarlett 2i2 1st generation audio interface

Software and processing:
• Recorded in iZotope RX 7 Audio Editor at 96/24
• De-click (Random Clicks with Sensitivity at 1.0 preset), De-hum (60 Hz Reduce preset), channels independently normalized to -0.20 dB as single recording (A and B side in same RX Document), additional manual de-clicking as needed and fades applied in iZotope RX 7 Audio Editor
• Final export from iZotope RX 7 as 96/24 FLAC level 8
• Tagged in kid3

EQed files:
• iZotope RX 7 as 96/24 FLAC level 8 files converted to 96/24 wav via MediaHuman Audio Converter
• Converted files imported to Logic Pro
• Newfangled Audio EQuivocate “match EQ” function used on Side A with Qobuz 48/24 digital release as input
• EQ applied to sides A and B
• Exported from Logic Pro as 96/24 wav
• Reimported to iZotope RX 7 and exported as 96/24 FLAC level 8
• Tagged in kid3
